WorkItem.Description:
So i have the following string as __input__:

__'Should pay $2000.30 and give back $300.'__

The __output__ int he word doc comes out as:

__'Should pay 00.30 and give back 0__ '


I think, library is not able to differentiate between the variables and amounts in string. Please let me know if there is temporary fix to this issue i am working on an important project at work and this is the only thing stopping the release of project. 


Thank you in advance :)
WorkItem.Summary: Library treats amount in strings as variables
